data: Award from Tata Steel for Best Performance Oct 18, 2023 Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd. was honored with the Best Performance Award from Tata Steel in October 2023, in recognition of our exemplary work on several large-scale steel supply projects. Tata Steel acknowledged our ability to deliver high-quality steel products that consistently meet stringent performance requirements. Our collaboration has resulted in successful outcomes across multiple projects, further strengthening our relationship with one of Indiaâ€™s leading steel manufacturers. This award highlights our dedication to maintaining top-tier production standards, timely delivery, and innovative problem-solving in the steel industry. Request a Quote
